instructions: From the home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'Personal,' tap Language & input . Tap Current Keyboard . Tap CHOOSE KEYBOARDS . Tap to choose default keyboard: Gboard Google Korean Input Google Pinyin Input Google voice typing iWinn IME
From the alphabet keyboard, tap the 123? key. Tap the number and symbol keys as necessary. Tap the ABC key to return to the alphabet keyboard.

From the home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap General . Under 'Personal,' tap Language & input . Tap the desired keyboard to adjust its text entry mode. Gboard Google Korean Input Google Pinyin Input Google voice typing iWinn IME Follow additional prompts to edit text entry mode.
